content: The memory usage is liveness analysis (it can be disabled by putting #[automatically_derived] on impl block. There is definitely a lot of room for improvement there, but there were also proposals for moving it from HIR to MIR.
liveness analysis is used for optimizing dead code, right? Why is that in rustc instead of llvm?
in this context is is just a lint to detect unused variables, dead assignments etc, automatically_derived disables the lint
